name: The Beginners Guide to Notion
description: If you have been struggling with grasping the basics of Notion, then fret not! The Beginner's Guide to Notion will help you get comfortable with Notion to build your personal/business workspace.The Guide currently covers the following:BlocksSynced BlocksDatabasesFormulasShortcutsThe guide will be enhanced over time, so the scope of the guide will expand.What you will receivePDF file with the Notion guide link so that you can bookmark it on your browserFAQDoes this work with a free Notion account
features: Synced Blocks; PDF file with the Notion guide link so that you can bookmark it on your browser; Does this work with a free Notion account?Yes! This template will work with any type of account, free or premium; Yes! This template will work with any type of account, free or premium; Is there any setup needed for this template?No. The template will be Read-only.; No. The template will be Read-only.
